trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the database table that a class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the table the class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the table the class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the table the class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the schema of the table the class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The schema of the table the class is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x
